verbose_text: Recent studies showed that injection of the immunogenic MOG 35-55 peptide in the ocular anterior chamber of the eye induced generation of splenic CD4 + and CD8 + regulatory T cells and suppressed EAE in mice [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: MOG 35-55  peptide in the ocular anterior chamber of the eye induced generation of splenic CD4 +  and CD8
